channel.title: website builder on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in website builder on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Adobe Muse Logo
Adobe Muse is a discontinued offline website builder used to create fixed, fluid, or adaptive websites, without the need to write code. It generates static pages, but does not manage hosting. Users can add more advanced functionality such as blogging and eCommerce to their website with plugins created by third-party developers. This application is available to download through Adobe’s Creative Cloud subscription. Technical support for Muse ended on March 26, 2020.
You can download theMuselogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Muse
item.description: Adobe Muse is a discontinued offline website builder used to create fixed, fluid, or adaptive websites, without the need to write code. It generates static pages, but does not manage hosting. Users can add more advanced functionality such as blogging and eCommerce to their website with plugins created by third-party developers. This application is available to download through Adobe’s Creative Cloud subscription. Technical support for Muse ended on March 26, 2020.
